meta_description: The Armory Art Center’s mission is to inspire the creation and experience of art. We offer nearly 100 courses, held in 12 state-of-the-art studios at our historic location in West Palm Beach, FL.
admission_text:
## **MEMBERSHIPS**

#### Discounted Classes, Early Class Registration, Exclusive Invites, and More!

Annual memberships provide critical and sustaining support for the Armory Art Center education programs and year-round exhibitions. As a member, you are standing with us, promoting art, and positive change in our community. Specific memberships are eligible to receive reciprocal entry to over 1000 other museums and move via ROAM (Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums).

If you have any questions about your membership, please contact our front desk at 561-832-1776.

_Membership benefits are valid for one year from the date of purchase. All membership sales are final. No refunds, returns or exchanges. All memberships excluding Corporate are tax deductible less $40._

**INFO + BENEFITS**

### __INDIVIDUAL | $140

  * Unlimited year-round admission the Armory Art Center Standard Gallery Events
  * Advance notice of exhibitions, special events and offers
  * “Member only” early bird registration
  * Subscription to the Armory’s newsletter
  * Exclusive deals on qualifying Armory ticketed events
  * Reciprocal benefits at more than 1,000 participating museum and cultural center through (ROAM) Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums

###  __FAMILY | $240

All the benefits listed above plus:

  * Special invites to Gallery shop previews and preview night discounts
  * 10% off of purchases from the Gallery Shop
  * 10% off of youth and teen classes and camps
  * Family me...
